import React, {useState, use} from "react" import classes from "./Meal.module.css" import MealForm from "./MealForm" import CartContext from "../../../context/CartContext" const Meal = (props)=>{ const [quantity,setQuantity] = useState(1) console.log(props) const price = `$${props.price.toFixed(2)}` const handleQuantity =(updated)=>{ setQuantity(updated) console.log(quantity) } return(

  • {props.name}

    • ) } export default Meal
